title: Red (Taylor's Version)
description:
Taylor talks about the inspiration behind this song and why she chose it for the album title. Lacey, Amy, Ana and Nick break down the many meanings behind this song. Plus, more evidence that Speak Now is next?! And lots of ideas for the merch store!
And don't forget that we are giving away a signed Taylor Swift autographed album! Details in the previous episode.
What did we miss? What would you like to hear next? There are lots of ways to contact us!

CONTACT THE PODCAST!
